sentences.en: Failure is never quite so frightening as regret do.
sentences.cn: 比失败更令人恐惧的是懊悔。

sentences.en: He talks quite slowly and spaces his words out.
sentences.cn: 他说得很慢，每个词之间都有停顿。

sentences.en: he's quite a bit older than she is.
sentences.cn: 他比她老得多。

sentences.en: His playing as a trumpet player was quite revolutionary.
sentences.cn: 他的小号演奏独创一格。

sentences.en: I can see it quite clearly.
sentences.cn: 我能清清楚楚地看见它。

sentences.en: I don't drive and the buses are quite hopeless.
sentences.cn: 我不开车，公共汽车条件又太糟糕。

sentences.en: I felt quite bitter about it at the time.
sentences.cn: 当时我对此感到相当痛苦。

sentences.en: I got quite a lot of ribbing from my team-mates.
sentences.cn: 队友们经常开我的玩笑。

sentences.en: I know it's nothing serious and I feel quite unemotional about it.
sentences.cn: 我知道那根本没什么大不了的，所以有些无动于衷。

sentences.en: I'm afraid Oliver isn't feeling quite the thing this morning.
sentences.cn: 恐怕奥利弗今早感觉不舒服。

sentences.en: I’m sorry. That’s quite impossible.
sentences.cn: 我很抱歉，那是完全不可能的。

sentences.en: It was quite a shock to see my face on that screen!
sentences.cn: 从那个屏幕上看到我的脸，真让人惊愕不已。

sentences.en: it's been quite a year.
sentences.cn: 这一年真不一般。

sentences.en: it's been quite a year.
sentences.cn: 这一年真不一般。

sentences.en: Many farmers will then chase you off their land quite aggressively.
sentences.cn: 许多农民然后就会凶巴巴地把你从他们的土地上撵走。

sentences.en: my hair's not quite dry.
sentences.cn: 我的头发还没完全干。

sentences.en: my job involves quite a lot of travel.
sentences.cn: 我的工作需要经常旅行。

sentences.en: quite a party, isn't it?.
sentences.cn: 聚会相当不错，是吧？。

sentences.en: quite a party, isn't it?.
sentences.cn: 聚会相当不错，是吧？。

sentences.en: quite the little horsewoman, aren't you?.
sentences.cn: 你真是个出色的小女骑手，对吧？。

sentences.en: quite the little horsewoman, aren't you?.
sentences.cn: 你真是个出色的小女骑手，对吧？。

sentences.en: Shares and bonds can bring one quite a considerable additional income.
sentences.cn: 股票和债券能给人带来不菲的额外收入。

sentences.en: She became quite a notable director in the thirties and forties.
sentences.cn: 她在三四十年代成了一位名导演。

sentences.en: She had quite severe bruising and a cut lip.
sentences.cn: 她身上有严重的淤伤，嘴唇也破了。

sentences.en: she hasn't been seen for quite some time.
sentences.cn: 人们很长时间没见到她了。

sentences.en: she hasn't quite got the hang of it yet.
sentences.cn: 她还没完全掌握窍门。

sentences.en: She was afraid in a way that was quite new to her.
sentences.cn: 她感到从未有过的害怕。

sentences.en: The lighthouse beam was quite distinct in the gathering dusk.
sentences.cn: 灯塔的光束在渐浓的暮色中清晰可见。

sentences.en: This may sound trivial, but I assure you it is quite important!
sentences.cn: 这听上去也许微不足道，但是，相信我，它十分重要！

sentences.en: Well, actually it requires quite a bit of work and research.
sentences.cn: 呃，实际上这需要相当多的工作和研究。

sentences.en: You're quite a party animal aren't you, out there every night.
sentences.cn: 你就是为派对而生的，不是吗，每天晚上你都去参加派对。

phrases.tran_cn: 异常的；出众的；印象很深的
有一阵子，半天；相当长一段时间

trans.tran_cn: 很，相当，非常，的确，确实如此
trans.tran_en: You use quite to indicate that something is the case to a fairly great extent
